name: Shoot Bottle Lite
description:
Tapping the screen to shoot as many bottles as you can. You need to avoid shooting the bombs. Gear up for this exciting and addictive game that allows you to experience the pure fun of breaking and shooting.

Features: 
-15 colorful bottles
-Survival mode
-Time mode
-Fun splash effects
-High quality sound effects
-Game Center leaderboards
